li.p: Severe or fatal injury can result from electrical shock during contact with high voltage conductors, monitoring PCBs, or similar equipment.
A licensed electrician must install each unit.
Wear suitable personal protective clothing and use protective equipment for performing mechanical and electrical installations.
Disconnect power before drilling holes, attaching cables or conduit, or connecting PDUs to other power distribution equipment.
Leave ample space for attaching and routing wires.

p.note: Power wiring must comply with NEC and applicable local codes and should be wired by licensed electricians.

body.p: Reference your submittal package for 1-line drawings specific to your PDU configuration.
body.note: Grounding for this equipment must comply with NEC and local building and electrical codes.
